name: Burger For Me
description:
Burger For Me

You move to a new country with your family.
It's the first day on the job, you still don't know the locals language.
But you have to make money for your family!
Can you learn the language and make enough money for
you and your family to survive?

Notes*
-There's a written in game tutorial to get you started
-This game was made during the Jam, this version has a bunch of fixes from the original
